domino_project

Class SetOfTiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • domino_project.SetOfTiles
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicDominoLine, CardinalDominoLine

    public class SetOfTiles
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Set Of Tiles(a number of Tiles) by using an ArrayList.

        Returns:

      • fillSet28

        public void fillSet28()
        Fills the Set Of Tiles with 28 different Tiles with numbers in [0,6]. Every Tile exists only once.([0,0] [0,1] ...[6,5] [6,6]). Then calls the shuffleAll() private method.

      • getSize

        Returns the number of Elements in this Set Of Tiles

        the number of elements in this Set Of Tiles
